name: Spare A Min
description:
Spare A Min was for a contest hosted by NCPC in late 2015 which the topic is about educating teenagers about cyberwellness. This project had won 3rd prize in the contest.

Spare A Min is a game about cyberwellness, which includes topics such as cybersecurity, making friends online and cyberbullying, integrated into a game where the players will be educated through playing the various mini games that are available such as tapping out bad messages, quickly tapping the right answers and using hand eye coordination to eliminate viruses.

My role for this project was on programming and made the different viruses to appear so that the player can eliminate the viruses. This project has also educated me on the different viruses that have been appearing such as trojans, bugs and worms. I have grown to be a better team player in this project as we were all juggling with our studies and this project.

How to play

  • Tap on the different icons of the different games accordingly
